~Display tips in pages~.
    ~Tips can be inserted in page using function <<span class="odocwiki_inlinecode"|display>>~,
    that may be called anywhere during the generation of a page~.
    ~The tip will be actually sent and displayed on client side
    only if the user has not already seen it~.


* <<span class="odocwiki_inlinecode"|~~name>> is a unique name you must choose for your tip
* <<span class="odocwiki_inlinecode"|~?arrow>> is the position of the arrow if you want one
* <<span class="odocwiki_inlinecode"|~?top>>~, <<span class="odocwiki_inlinecode"|~?bottom>>~, <<span class="odocwiki_inlinecode"|~?left>>~, <<span class="odocwiki_inlinecode"|~?right>>~, <<span class="odocwiki_inlinecode"|~?width>>~, <<span class="odocwiki_inlinecode"|~?right>> correspond
    to the eponymous ~C~S~S properties~.
